sqlMap.select: select name from COMPONENT where COMPONENT_ID = '1'
sqlMap.update:
update COMPONENT
ORG_ID=#orgId# CODE=#code# NAME=#name# COMPONENT_TYPE_ID=#componentTypeId# REG_TIME=#regTime# STATE=#state# STATE_TIME=#stateTime# PASSWORD=#password# DESCRIPTOR=#descriptor# S_FILE_ID=#sfileId#
COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT to_char(SEQ_COMPONENT.NEXTVAL) FROM DUAL
insert into COMPONENT (REG_TIME,STATE,STATE_TIME
COMPONENT_ID ORG_ID CODE CODE NAME COMPONENT_TYPE_ID PASSWORD DESCRIPTOR S_FILE_ID TENANT_ID
) values(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0 ,
#state# 'A'
,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
#componentId# #orgId# #code# #componentId# #name# #componentTypeId# #password# #descriptor# #sfileId# #tenantId#
)
sqlMap.select:
select COMPONENT_ID componentId , ORG_ID orgId , CODE code , NAME name, COMPONENT_TYPE_ID componentTypeId, REG_TIME regTime , STATE state, STATE_TIME stateTime, PASSWORD password, DESCRIPTOR descriptor from COMPONENT
COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# ORG_ID=#orgId# CODE=#code# NAME LIKE '%'||#name#||'%' COMPONENT_TYPE_ID=#componentTypeId# REG_TIME=#regTime# STATE=#state# STATE_TIME=#stateTime# PASSWORD=#password# DESCRIPTOR=#descriptor# tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM COMPONENT WHERE STATE NOT IN ('G','X')
COMPONENT_ID IN ($componentId$) tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT COMPONENT_ID componentId , NAME name FROM COMPONENT WHERE STATE NOT IN ('G','X')
NAME LIKE '%'||#name#||'%' tenant_id=#tenantId#

select COMPONENT_ID componentId , ORG_ID orgId , CODE code , NAME name, COMPONENT_TYPE_ID componentTypeId, REG_TIME regTime , STATE state, STATE_TIME stateTime, PASSWORD password, DESCRIPTOR descriptor from COMPONENT WHERE STATE NOT IN ('G','X') and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
COMPONENT_ID IN ($componentId$) tenant_id=#tenantId#

select * from COMPONENT WHERE code = #code#
COMPONENT_ID != #componentId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
